title: Model Estuary Meeting #1. This is an Estuary Meeting
description:
The Estuary Host Support Network has been operational for  over a year now and they have developed what I call the Estuary Protocol. John Van Donk and I described it in a previous video. https://youtu.be/oSJL-80oP5A

Even though generally speaking we don't record Estuary meetings I thought it might be helpful to have a few Model meetings available so that people could see them in action. This is the first go of that. 

If you'd like to find an Estuary meeting or if you'd like to beg involved in the Estuary Host Support Network to become an Estuary Host check the link below. https://sites.google.com/view/estuaryhubcontent/home
